Scotlands Trnsmt music festival has been branded irresponsible after appearing to blame Nicola Sturgeon for its cancellation.
The event at Glasgow Green was due to take place from July 10-12, headlined by Lewis Capaldi and Liam Gallagher.
Organisers today a… [+475 chars]

articles.title: Tom Hanks wrote a letter to a boy named Corona who was being bullied and it's perfect - indy100
articles.content:
People are obsessed with "hero" Tom Hanks's heartwarming gesture to an eight-year-old boy being bullied because his name is Corona. 
Corona De Vries, who lives on Australia's Gold Coast, wrote to Tom Hanks and his wife Rita Wilson in early April to wish them… [+1923 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: 'We're giving our tour buses to the NHS' - BBC News
articles.description: Buses which are usually home to rock stars are now giving frontline workers a place to rest.
articles.content:
Image copyrightVans For BandsImage caption
 Buses have been deployed all over the UK including this one at The Whittington NHS Trust in London
Music fans won't need reminding there are no live gigs happening at the moment.
